name: The Brocket
description:
Build a rocket with brofist mold to brofist the giant that is about to destroy earth!

LOOK UP! A galactic giant has arrived to earth to destroy it! Here comes the punch... no, that is not a punch, that's a brofist! You, an intellectual, just sees the giant wanting  to brofist the people of earth! That is why you have to build a rocket, a brocket, to brofist the giant back.  Don't leave a giant hanging you know!

You need to gather:

  1. A big fist mold!
  2. A wooden pillar!
  3. A working engine!

You need to do the following:

  • Find wood in the hardware store!
  • Gather enough plastic, melt it and get help to mold it into a fist!
  • Get your hand on a fuctional engine that can fly this brocket!
  • Assemble on the aparment's roof!
